sidebar.title: Donate!
sidebar.para: Even though TortoiseGit and TortoiseMerge are free, you can support the developers by sending in patches and play an active role in the development. You can also help to cheer us up during the endless hours we spend in front of our computers.

While working on TortoiseGit we love to listen to music. And since we spend many hours on the project we need a lot of music. Therefore we have set up some wish-lists with our favourite music CDs and DVDs:
http://TortoiseGit.tigris.org/donate.html
Please also have a look at the list of people who contributed to the project by sending in patches or translations.
